Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI usually marks my assignments at 100%. My teachers provide more honest feedback which I can use.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt nothing from GenAI feedback because I deemed it inaccurate. In regards to my teachers feedback, how I felt was dependent on my mark.
